item.title: Streaming camera output from Raspberry Pi
item.description: Task was to transmit image from camera on raspberry pi through web interface to the PC. PC is connected to raspberry through local network. Enable camera on your raspberry pi in raspi-conf. Reboot. Save the following source code to a file on your raspberry (let’s say streaming.py) do sudo pip3 install picamera run python3 streaming.py on the target machine (PC) go to http://<your raspberry ip or host name>:8000. output from the camera must be streaming in realtime.
